title: Hawaiian Sliders
directions: Slice tops from rolls and place bottoms in baking pan. Layer ham and cheese on rolls. Replace tops. Combine butter, poppy seeds, mustard, Worcestershire, and onion powder and mix well. Drizzle over rolls. Cover with foil and bake at 350Â° for 30 minutes or until cheese melts. Uncover and cook for 2 additional minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 pkg Hawaiian, sweet dinner rolls (12 ct)
